channel.title: Irrlicht Open Source 3D engine
channel.description: This is something i stumbled upon and it is quite amazing its definately worth a look in if you are planning on making something 3D. Here are some examples of what has been done with it [URL=http://irrlicht.sourceforge.net/screenshots-projects.html]Screenshots/Projects[/URL] [URL=http://irrlicht.sourceforge.net/]Homepage[/URL] [URL=http://irrlicht.sourceforge.net/downloads.html]Download Irrlicht 1.4[/URL] [URL=http://irrlicht.sourceforge.net/toolset.html]Tool Set[/URL] Enjoy it
